title: Avril
description: Avril - Supermarché santé sells natural and certified organic products and certified organic produce. They also sell gluten-free, fair trade, and environmentally-friendly products as well as vitamins, supplements, natural cosmetics, herbal medicine and other natural health products. Qualified staff include naturopaths, homeopaths, herborists, and cosmeticians. Pricing is competitive. See website for other locations in Quebec.
